entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump FYI covid19 cases are surging. The European Union is seriously considering a ban on travel from the US. "Liberate" the states, right? Maybe you can be a big boy about statues of racists when your fellow Americans stop dying. You're making this a sh*thole country. 🇺🇸
